text: The Force will be with you... always.
This unit can fire at the enemy whilst remaining hidden.
They push the limits of the human body.
With each volley their shots become ever more powerful and accurate.
They'll smash anything in their way. Or die.
In the midst of a bloodbath, it's nice to know that someone has your back.
The flame of hope shines bright in the darkest hour.

They will fight hard to uphold the honour of their homeland.

Their energy is like a dragon.
